title: Ungentlemanly Behaviour
description: A powerful persuasionAbby Sommers is an excellent lawyer with a particular interest in representing teenagers, so it's no surprise when she secures the case of young Greg Lane. At Greg's insistence she sets up a meeting with this father, arrogantly attractive millionaire Hallem Lane.Hallem has a big problem with Abbey. For one thing, she's far too alluring to be taken seriously in court, and for another, he is convinced she has designs on his son. But Hallem has decided he wants her for himself, and he never take no for an answer.
author: Margaret Mayo
